Body: I have a HTC One V which runs the default HTC supplied android 4.0, I have not rooted it (and I shouldn't need to for this.I occasionally come across situations where I've got a dialup (or non GSM mobile internet) or other non wireless network and wireless would be really useful. Can I connect my phone to a computer on the internet through USB with USB passthrough - which is supported, then share that through hotspot mode?
Title: Can i use the Hotspot feature with a USB network connection on my HTC One V?

history.Text: I have a [HTC One V][1] which runs the default HTC supplied android 4.0, I have not rooted it (and I shouldn't need to for this. I occasionally come across situations where I've got a dialup (or non GSM mobile internet) or other non wireless network and wireless would be *really* useful. Can I connect my phone to a computer on the internet through USB with USB passthrough - [which is supported][2], then share that through [hotspot mode][3]?    [1]: http://www.htc.com/uk/smartphones/htc-one-v/  [2]: http://www.htc.com/help/in/howto_iframe.aspx?id=167187&type=1&p_id=439  [3]: http://www.htc.com/help/in/howto_iframe.aspx?id=167202&type=1&p_id=439
Can i use the Hotspot feature with a USB network connection on my HTC One V?
